name: TP Survival
description:
Description

A small game about survival and how a simple paper product could be the cure that we all need. 

Note: The Exit button does not work when playing the game in the browser. Just close the page for now....

Controls 

W or Up Key - Move Up

S or Down Key - Move Down

A or Left Key - Move Left

D or Right Key - Move Right

Credits

Song - Night Owl - Broke for Free
